item.description:
Biotech Tuesday Event Location: Market 21 Broad Street Boston, MA 02109 Date: August 23, 2011 Time: 7 :00pm-10:00pm Cost: Free Registration: http://www.acteva.com/booking.cfm?bevaid=222760  

Join members of BiotechTuesday at our open and free networking event this month at Market. Take advantage of this opportunity to learn more about BiotechTuesday and to engage in quality networking with biotech professionals in the Boston area. Market offers a nice rooftop deck to enjoy a summer night if the weather permits.

 

Please note: This is the registration page for non-members only.
item.name: Biotech Tuesday - August 17th
